title: Oral Cancer Screening
description: Join us at Wellness Extravaganza 2023 for a day of health and well-being. Discover the latest trends in fitness, nutrition, and mental health. Attend engaging workshops, meet experts, and explore a wide range of health products.

title: Nutrition Counselling
description: The Healthy Living Summit is a one-day event dedicated to promoting a healthier lifestyle. Experience interactive exhibits, cooking demonstrations, and expert talks on fitness, nutrition, and holistic wellness.

title: Blood Sugar Screening
description: Escape to a tranquil retreat for a weekend of self-care and mindfulness. Our Mindful Health Retreat offers guided meditation, yoga, and wholesome meals. Recharge your body and mind in a serene natural setting.

title: Massage and Weight Management
description: Unlock the secrets of healthy and delicious cooking at our Nutrition & Cooking Masterclass. Expert chefs will teach you how to prepare nutritious and delectable dishes that promote well-being.

title: Blood Pressure Screening
description: Get ready for a day of fitness fun at the Fitness Challenge Expo. Participate in a variety of fitness challenges, from obstacle courses to dance-offs. This event is free and open to all fitness enthusiasts.

title: Optometrist and Vision Test
description: Explore the world of holistic health at our fair. Learn about alternative therapies, herbal remedies, and ancient healing practices. Engage with experts, attend workshops, and discover holistic approaches to well-being.
